Package com.plutonian.plutonianProducts.controller

Class ProductAttributeController

java.lang.Object
com.plutonian.plutonianProducts.controller.ProductAttributeController
@CrossOrigin
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/productAttribute")
public class ProductAttributeController
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Steve Bentley Product Attribute entity controller. This controller takes requests from the web server and queries the database. Logic should be handled in this class. All requests in this class begin with a "/productAttribute" URL.

Please reference Programmers Manual - Detailed requirements for Requirements Tracing - 1.2.4.3, 1.5, 2.2.*, 3.2.*, 3.4, 4.1.*, 5.2.1, 5.2.3, 6.3-7, 7.1, 7.2.*, 7.3, 7.3.*, 8.2

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductAttributeController

      public ProductAttributeController()

  • Method Details

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public java.util.Optional<ProductAttribute> getById​(@PathVariable int id)
      Queries database for product attributes by their SKU. Calls instance of repository to create a query. Handles a GET call from the server in the form of JSON. Returns the query results in the form of JSON
      Parameters:
      id - int of JSON from URL parameter.
      Returns:
      Optional product attribute entity in JSON form.

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/all") public java.util.List<ProductAttribute> getAll()
      Gets all the product attributes in the database. Handles GET requests by calling the repository and returns JSON for the server.
      Returns:
      List of product attributes for JSON conversion.

    • getTypesByID

      @GetMapping("/types/{id}") public java.util.List<ProductAttribute> getTypesByID​(@PathVariable int id)
      Get types of an Item by its ID. Uses the product entity table id to return the SKUs of all available types of a given product.
      Parameters:
      id - int id of item from product entity table
      Returns:
      List of product attributes entities.
